fields.name: Temple of the Trolls
fields.description: You are given a map to the secret entrance to the Temple of the Trolls. Seek out Grommick, the great weaponsmith, who might be able to forge a powerful weapon if you prove yourself worthy!
fields.intro_text:
You were walking through the Main Hall on your way back to the privy when you overheard an old man and another man in some kind of argument over wagering an old map.

The old man said he would not wager such a valuable item, especially when it could be dangerous.  The other man became quite belligerent and tried to take the map.  There was a struggle and just as you decided to intervene the man pulled a knife and stabbed the old man!  When you stepped through the curtain to assist the older gentleman, the ruffian scrambled away in fear.

You went to the old man to help and with his dying breath he slipped you an old map and told you to never let it fall into the wrong hands, for it was a map to the secret entrance to the Temple of the Trolls.  If the wrong people got a hold of it, and started raiding the temple, the ancient human-troll wars would start all over again.

You took the map and left the old man in the care of the local medic to try to go after the young man that stabbed him.

---

After several hours with no luck, you break off the search and begin wondering about the Trollish Legends.  There are stories of great heroes and of tragedies in the history of the humans and trolls.  Many of the legends tell of the great skill of the troll weapon-makers.  Trolls with superior skill in the forging of magic weapons.

Suddenly a thought strikes you.  You now possess a map to lead you to the troll empire.  You have a chance to confront trolls on their own ground.  Perhaps you can learn the secret of this great skill in weapon making -- or better still, have the weapon maker, the Great Grommick, forge a weapon for you!  Some of the ancient tales said the trolls could be commissioned to forge a weapon for the human who was able to pay the price -- and prove himself.

And so you set off with the map to find the Temple of the Trolls!

fields.name: You are in the woods. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the woods in front of the secret entrance to the Temple of the Trolls. There was heavy brush all over and you would never have found the entrance (north) without the map. South is the way home.

fields.name: You are at an entrance to the caves. (N/S)
fields.description: There are some bones scattered around the north entry. It is a dark mold encrusted archway with old runes carved into the walls. There's a large chamber to the north.

fields.name: You are in a large plain cavern. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern with high ceilings. There is a TORCH bolted on the north wall. It is very dimly lit in here and you can barely make out a small hole in the east wall. It is just big enough to squeeze through.

fields.name: You are in a small broken tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small broken tunnel running east and west. There's a large cavern to the east and another back to the west. A dim light can be seen coming from both directions.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (S/W)
fields.description: You've entered a cave with high ceilings. It looks as if a fierce battle occurred here long ago. Tunnels lead west and south.

fields.name: You are in a small tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: There is a large chamber to the south. The walls are very rough and the tunnel is very narrow here.

fields.name: You are in the North Hour Glass room. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a gigantic room that as a whole is shaped like an hour glass. You are in the top portion of the hour glass with the south end being the bottom. There a ledge next to the hole to the south that you can walk on.

fields.name: You are in the South Hour Glass room. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the south half of the large hour glass shaped room. There is a large hole in the floor to the south. You see a rope above you.

fields.name: You are at the edge of the hole. (N/W/D)
fields.description: You are at the edge of the hole in the floor standing on a narrow ledge. Any wrong moves from here could be fatal. Far below you hear a steady droning, but can not tell what it is. A giant pit leads down into darkness...

fields.name: You are in a secret east/west passage. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable secret east/west passage. There is a chamber to the west.

fields.name: You are in a secret chamber. (E)
fields.description: There is strange writing on the walls in here. The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a small stone room. (S/E/W/D)
fields.description: There are doors to the south, east and west. A set of stairs also leads down from here. The floor and walls are made of smooth stone blocks.

fields.name: You are in a small stone room. (S/W)
fields.description: There are exits to the west and south. The room is apparently used for sleeping quarters of guests or moderately important people.

fields.name: You are in a small stone room. (N/W)
fields.description: There are exits to the north and west. It is a bit dusty in here, but still clean enough to make a nice living quarters.

fields.name: You are in a fancy stone room. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a stone room that serves as a kind of central hall. There are fancy carvings and lattice work on the surface of the stone in here. Exits are north, east and west.

fields.name: You are in a dirty stone chamber. (N/E)
fields.description: The maid must not ever get to this room! It is the absolute pits. Dead rats lie in a corner of the room. Exits are to the north and east. You notice a strange rock here.

fields.name: You are in a dimly lit stone room. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a dimly lit stone room, with exits to the east and south. The room is lightly covered in cob webs and dust.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of a pit. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark room at the bottom of the pit. There are doorways to the east and west and a tunnel running to the south.

fields.name: You are in a tiny storage room. (E)
fields.description: You are in a tiny storage room to the west of the dark chamber. There are a bunch of old tools in here, but nothing of any value.

fields.name: You are in a small storage room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small storage room to the east of a dark chamber. There's some old clothing and armor in here and some old tools. The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a north/south tunnel. There is a huge central chamber to the south.

fields.name: You are in a huge center temple. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be a huge temple. There are massive columns on each wall and a huge archway over the east doorway. There is a door south. A tunnel also leads in from the north.

fields.name: You are in a rites room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a large room that looks like it is used for special rites of the Old Troll religion. There is a modest altar in the center of the room. The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are in the inner temple. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in the inner temple. You do not know what this room is really used for, but it looks more important than the outer temple. The exit is north.

fields.name: You are behind the secret altar. (N/D)
fields.description: You are behind the secret altar of the inner Temple of the Trolls. There is a stairway to the south leading down into darkness.

fields.name: You are in a large oval chamber. (S/U)
fields.description: You are in a large oval chamber with a stairway leading up and a doorway to the south. The droning noise you heard earlier is stronger here.

fields.name: You are in a huge slave encampment. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are in a huge cavern where chained human slaves are forced to work by the nasty trolls. Most of the slaves look as though they have been here for years and do not seem to care anymore. They are all being forced to mine.

fields.name: You are in a short north/south tunnel.
fields.description: The slave mines are to the north and a four-way intersection is to the south.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection in the mining portion of the Troll Empire. To the south is a large chamber.

fields.name: You are in a large slave holding place. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large chamber used to hold the slaves when they are not working. A heavy door locks from the outside. The place smells horrible. The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in an east/west passage. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west passage. There is a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small dirty room. (S)
fields.description: You are in a small dirty room with the only exit to the south. The walls are covered with a gaudy blueberry colored dye or paint.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: The tunnel bends from the west to the south here.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are doors leading into small chambers to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a mid-sized chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a mid-sized chamber carved from the rock. The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a medium sized dirt room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a medium sized dirt-walled chamber with the only exit to the west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a north/south tunnel with doorways leading into small chambers to the east and west. Darkness prevents you from seeing into the chambers.

fields.name: You are in a small rock chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber that has been chipped out of the rock. The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a small stone room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with stone walls and floor. There are scuff marks on the floor as if heavy furniture had been moved in and out of here. The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are at the south end of the tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the south end of the south bound tunnel. There are chambers to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber that is only marked by a large sign etched into the rock in Trollish which reads, "WEST".

fields.name: You are in a large chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a large chamber with the exit to the west. There is some blood on the floor and scratches and chipped rock mar the walls. The floor is not very level here, and is made of solid rock with big swatches of hair all over.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: There is a bend in the tunnel to the west. In the distance you can hear that droning sound becoming a bit louder.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/E)
fields.description: You are at a bend in the tunnel. You may go east or south. The vibrating droning noise is a bit clearer here and it seems to be coming from the south.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: A door to the east looks very dark. The noise seems to be coming from the south.

fields.name: You are in a small dark room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small dark room lit only by your torch. There is no redeeming value to this room. It seems only to serve as a hiding place for trolls, monsters and other things that go bump in the night.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: The droning noise is louder here and seems to come from the east, but with all the echoing it's hard to tell for sure.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a strange east-west tunnel. The droning noise adds an eerie atmosphere to the passage. There is a bend in the tunnel to the east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: The noises are definitely coming from the south and you can see light and smoke coming from that direction. The tunnel also goes west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south is a large archway with Trollish writing over it. There are doors to the east and west. Smoke fills the room to the south so you can't see into it.

fields.name: You are in the vault. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small vault. It must not be actively used as such anymore, though as it is filled with large amounts of black rocks and dust. The exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a large storage room. (W)
fields.description: There are strange artifacts in here that you can't identify. The exit is west.

fields.name: You are in the guardian's chamber. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a large chamber with huge steel spikes on the walls. Writing on the wall in here says, "WOE TO YE - PREPARE TO MEET THY MAKER! FOR THIS BE THE CHAMBER OF THE MIGHTY GUARDIAN OF THE TROLLS!".

fields.name: You are in the forge room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a very wide room with a large forge. It is the central forge for all of the trolls. It is hot and smoky. The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: There is a T-intersection to the north and south from here. The droning noise is coming from the north.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a T-intersection in the tunnel. There are chambers to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in a dimly lit side chamber. (E)
fields.description: The only exit is to the east. There are some chains bolted to the wall here. A stuffy moldy smell is very dominant in here.

fields.name: You are in a dimly lit side chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a dimly lit chamber. There are chains fastened to the walls here and a skeleton hanging from them. The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are on a hidden stairway. (U/D)
fields.description: You are standing on a stairway leading up and down. A faint trickle of water is flowing down the steps.

fields.name: You are in a short east/west tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel is very narrow and dirty and dark with a door to the south and another to the west.

fields.name: You are in the Troll Guard quarters. (E)
fields.description: You have entered the barracks room of the Troll Guards. There are rows of old straw mattresses. At first you thought you were in a barn or stable. It is so smelly and rank in here it makes you sick! The exit is east.

fields.name: You are in the Sergeant's room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a room used as an office by the Sergeant of the Guard. There is a desk in the center of the room with mining schedules and such scattered around on it. The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in the forest. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are standing in front of a grand stone archway. The sunlight streams in from the south and the forest stretches out in all directions. As you step forth and look around, the archway vanishes as you find yourself in the forest.

fields.name: You are behind a secret panel. (U/D)
fields.description: You are behind a secret panel in the throne room. There is a very dark stairway leading down from here.

fields.name: Holfane Sword
fields.description: You see a very well made troll sword with the King's name engraved on it.

fields.name: Grommick hammer
fields.description: You see a mighty hammer with the name "Grommick" engraved on it.

fields.name: Wendasword
fields.description: You see a magnificent small sword with the name "Wendasword" engraved on it.

fields.name: Hacjac
fields.description: You see a terrible sword with the name "Hacjac" engraved on the hilt.

fields.name: Slisack
fields.description: You see a well made sword with the name "Slisack" engraved on the handle.

fields.name: slaves
fields.description: The slaves look tired and miserable.

fields.name: Hackenslash
fields.description: You see a very wicked looking axe called "Hackenslash".

fields.name: Uliksword
fields.description: You see a terrible weapon with the name "Uliksword" engraved on the hilt.

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: You see a small pile of diamonds.

fields.name: spike mace
fields.description: You see the spiked mace of Rimik.

fields.name: bottle
fields.description: There is dusty old bottle lying here. A label on it says, "Doctor X -- All Purpose Healing Potion".

fields.name: chalice
fields.description: You see a small silver chalice with jewels around its rim.

fields.name: gold dust
fields.description: You see a large pan of gold dust here.

fields.name: gold nuggets
fields.description: There are some large gold nuggets here, scattered about.

fields.name: sword blank
fields.description: You see a sword blank. These are used as the basis for building swords. This one is of excellent quality.

fields.name: sword blank2
fields.description: You see a sword blank with the number "2" stamped on it. It is a reasonably high quality.

fields.name: sword blank3
fields.description: You see a sword blank with the number "3" stamped on it. It appears to be of good quality.

fields.name: torch
fields.description: You see a regular torch.

fields.name: old tools
fields.description: You see some old tools.

fields.name: old armor
fields.description: You see an old rusty suit of chain armor.

fields.name: troll clothing
fields.description: You see some old ragged troll clothing.

fields.name: emerald broach
fields.description: You found an expensive emerald broach hidden in a corner!

fields.name: magic powder
fields.description: You see a small bag of magic powder of some sort.

fields.name: Red Diamond of Haliak
fields.description: You found a famed troll heirloom. The Red Diamond of Haliak, the greatest prize of all the trolls! It was covered by coal in a far corner and looks as if it has been lost for decades.

fields.name: Amulet of Sorong
fields.description: You see a great magic amulet glowing and pulsating as it seems to hover above your hand. This must be the legendary magic Amulet of Sorong!

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: You see a large iron key.

fields.name: coal
fields.description: You recognize the black rocks to be common coal. It's market value is about 5 gold pieces per 10 gronds.

fields.name: dead rats
fields.description: You see a bunch of old dead rats.

fields.name: bones
fields.description: There are a few scattered bloody bones here that seem to tell a story of death and woe. (You can READ them.)

fields.name: large axe
fields.description: The sentry dropped a large axe.

fields.name: token of peace
fields.description: You found something in the dusty folds of the corpse's rotting garments. It is a small golden rod with a carving of a dove at one end and an olive branch set into the other end. A universal "token of peace"!

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: You found a scroll in the skeletal hand of the dead adventurer. It is very thin and fragile.

fields.name: old axe
fields.description: You see an old beat up axe. Neadie was using it to try to scalp you.

fields.name: axe handle
fields.description: You see an old wooden axe handle. Yeadie thought it would make a good weapon for re-arranging your features.

fields.name: old map
fields.description: You see the parchment that you found outside. It is worn and weathered and hard to read. It has a map and some notes scribbled on it (you can READ it).

fields.name: Hansword
fields.description: The sword is truly magnificent. It has a strange vibration running through it and a slight glow to the blade.

fields.name: jug of Grog
fields.description: Groggo has dropped his jug of Grog. It is a nasty tasting stuff that will stand your hair on end.

fields.name: iron gate
fields.description: You see a massive iron gate blocking the passage to the east. It is made of two inch thick steel bars criss-crossed for maximum strength and durability.

fields.name: steel key
fields.description: You see a massive steel key that was dropped by Bulik.

fields.name: Ulik the Invincible's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Ulik the Supposedly-Invincible.

fields.name: dead sentry
fields.description: You see the dead body of the sentry. He must have been somebody's lackey to get such perilous duty.

fields.name: desk
fields.description: It is a battered and worn old desk. It has a single drawer on it.

fields.name: a secret passage west
fields.description: You see a secret door to the west which some careless fool has left wide open.

fields.name: a trapdoor leading up
fields.description: Pulling on the rope causes a concealed trapdoor to come down. Looking into it, you discover a secret stairway!

fields.name: marble door
fields.description: There is a heavy marble door blocking a passage south.

fields.name: a secret stairway down
fields.description: You found a hidden stairway leading down!

fields.name: a secret stairway up
fields.description: You see a secret stairway up.

fields.name: runes
fields.description: Try READing them.

fields.name: strange writing
fields.description: Try READing it.

fields.name: writing
fields.description: Try READing it.

fields.name: dead adventurer
fields.description: You see the remains of a Free Adventurer lying up against one wall. His body now badly decomposed and his clothing rotten and falling off. His skeletal hand is clasped around something...

fields.text: The runes seem to be a warning to stay out.
Grommick says he has enough to make you a new sword. He says for you to go away and come back in the morning. You are then escorted out and put up in a nice chamber overnight.
The next morning you are awakened and led into Grommick's chamber where you are presented with your new sword. It has the name of "Hansword", and is now ready to take its place at your side.
The Great Grommick raises his arms, and a mist clears to the south revealing a great archway. You are led up to it in grand style and there is a large billow of smoke.
The bones tell you that there was once a troll-human war and that after many bloody years, it was a stand-off. Some of the trolls are still bitter, but not all.
The scroll is written in Trollish at the top and Common at the bottom. You are able to read the bottom half.
It states: "Please accept this, as a true sign of our willingness to come to a peaceful solution to our conflict. We offer it as a token of our good faith."

King Holfane accepts the gift and reads the scroll. When he is finished, he looks up at you and says, "All right, I accept your peace offering. You may go on. But there are others who will not accept you here.
"I can not convince them after all this time of hatred to trust you, but I will tell you the magic words, so that you can continue your weapon quest.

The map shows the way to the entrance, but not any details once inside. There are some rough notes written on the map. They seem to be an inventory list: "1. Sword blank, 2. Magic source, 3. Reward (BRIBE)"
As you enter the room, the King asks if you have the customary proof of friendship. He is an impatient, but fair ruler and does not want to kill you if you can prove sincerity.

When you enter the room, the King whirls around, flinging his cape across his arm and glares at you. He speaks in a broken common tongue, "Who are you, and what do you want here? - If you come in peace, prove it or die!"
Ulik is so amazed at your action that he turns beet red and walks away.
You feel an overpowering sensation and your wounds seem to clear up!
A shimmering wall of force surrounds your armor and strengthens it!
A booming voice says, "I CAN DO NOTHING FOR YOU AT THIS TIME!"
The whole room starts to rumble and shake! Suddenly the marble door in the south wall slides open!
You hear a voice rumble out, "WATCH YOUR LANGUAGE, PUNK!"
Ulik is greatly puzzled, but takes your weapon and walks away.
Ulik is very pleased with your token of peace and walks away.
The king accepts the token of peace and looks at you as if to say, "What's this for?"
The King asks, "Where is this token of peace?"
The only word you can make out is: "TREZORE".
It says "QORGAW". You're not sure if that is a magic word or a Trollish curse.
It says, "DANGER! Do not enter!"

fields.name: King Holfane
fields.description: You see a troll dressed very regally and looking quite majestic. He is also somewhat ugly (what do you expect for a troll?). He must be King Holfane, the King of the Northern Trolls.

fields.name: Grommick
fields.description: A troll stands next to the forge, with a very large hammer in his hand. He must be Grommick the Chief Blacksmith and the best weapon-maker in the land. He says he can make you a sword if you have a sword blank...

fields.name: Wenda
fields.description: You see a fairly attractive looking girl (for a troll!) with red body armour. She might be the girlfriend of one of the more powerful trolls, so I'd watch it.

fields.name: Brodjac
fields.description: You see a fierce troll warrior. He has a good set of armour and muscles on his muscles. He snarls at you, "You should never have entered the Land of the Trolls. My name is Brodjac and you are dead meat!"

fields.name: Halfjac
fields.description: You see a small troll with no apparent hate of the human race in his face. He simply looks at you with a look of disbelief. He says his name is Halfjac and that you aren't safe here.

fields.name: Wangba
fields.description: As you entered the room, a large troll turns to face you. He looks like he'd be real trouble if you had to fight him, but then he speaks, "You bring food for Wangba? I'm hungry!"

fields.name: Trogg
fields.description: You see a mighty troll wearing thick leather armour. He speaks a broken tongue that you can barely make out, "I am Trogg The Great!"

fields.name: Ulik the Invincible
fields.description: You are met by the mightiest troll of them all: Ulik the Invincible. The guardian of the famed Forge of the Troll Empire. No one has ever defeated him.

fields.name: Timik
fields.description: You see an average troll of about six and a half feet with well developed muscles, fangs and claws. He says his name is Timik, but you can't tell if he is friendly or not.

fields.name: Rimik
fields.description: You see a seven foot troll with a spiked mace. He snarls that he is Rimik and is not in any mood to play games.

fields.name: Sanig
fields.description: You see a peaceful looking troll in strange garb. You then realize he is a troll priest. You have never seen one before.

fields.name: Frong
fields.description: You see a rather peaceful looking troll with a very unusual robe on over his normal armour. He says he is "Frong".

fields.name: Tolos
fields.description: Against one wall is a troll in a very unusual brass armour. He has a helmet on that says "Tolos" over the face opening. He seems to be paying little attention to you.

fields.name: Slavack
fields.description: The slave master is a particularly ugly old troll with a scar across his face. When he sees you he says, "Ah, more slaves for the mine! Slavack will get reward for this!"

fields.name: Slave
fields.description: The slaves are very grateful to you for freeing them, and bow, genuflect, sob, cry, grovel and kiss your feet. Quite a disgusting bunch.

fields.name: Truq
fields.description: You see a rather friendly-looking troll whose face looks like it's been hit by a horse-drawn wagon! Maybe he has! He looks like he could survive it! He says his name is "Truq"! (John was obviously excited when he wrote this!)

fields.name: Harry the It
fields.description: You see something that is very hairy and walks kind of upright, but not entirely. Whatever it is, it is mostly hairy.

fields.name: Bulik
fields.description: You see a very mighty troll with a face like a squashed cabbage. He drools and slobbers that he is "Bulik, brother of Ulik!"

fields.name: Groggo
fields.description: You see a short, but mighty looking troll wearing bearskins. He doesn't appear to be too bright, because he is trying to roast a rabbit over a fire without a stick. He drinks a strange potion from a brown jug.

fields.name: Hakkard
fields.description: You see a gruesome troll with a guitar (or what's left of one) strapped to his back. He smiles and says he is the Great Hakkard, the Musical Troll.

fields.name: Quater
fields.description: You see a reasonably small troll with a strange scar across his face. He is the Troll Supply Master.

fields.name: Sentry
fields.description: You see a troll guard here. He says you are not permitted here and that you must leave.

fields.name: Hiccut
fields.description: You see a small troll who looks more like a dwarf than a troll. He is wearing a bear skin loincloth, brass armour, a bronze helmet and a red sash. He says he is Hiccut, Mightiest Barber of the Troll Race.

fields.name: Rupper
fields.description: A tall thin man in green Kabuki paint steps out of the shadows and screams at the top of his lungs! He is obviously crazed. A crude embroidery on his brown tattered shirt reads, "Rupper".

fields.name: Sergeant Hawk
fields.description: You see a burly troll in bronze armour. He is unshaven, has a sour disposition and is chewing a huge wad of tobacco. He barks orders to the others in the room and you realize he must be the Sergeant of the Guard (or a baseball player).

fields.name: Troggie
fields.description: One of the trolls is short and stupid looking. The Sergeant is calling him "Troggie".

fields.name: Soggie
fields.description: The other is even stupider looking and is dripping with sweat and grime.

fields.name: Neadie
fields.description: A troll sitting on the floor jumps up and grabs an axe.

fields.name: Yeadie
fields.description: Another troll grabs a nearby axe handle and gets off his stool.

fields.question: Temple of the Trolls -- New command.
Temple of the Trolls -- Magic words.
Temple of the Trolls -- How do I get past King Holfane?
Temple of the Trolls -- Where can I find a peace token?
Temple of the Trolls -- How do I open the marble door?
Temple of the Trolls -- How do I defeat Ulik?
Temple of the Trolls -- How do I get Grommick to make me a sword?

fields.answer: Note the new command, KISS. Use this to, well...kiss the trolls you meet...

You can SAY INFO to see the magic words the king told you. In addition, there are two special spells in this adventure, which you can find by careful examination of room descriptions. (Try READing any writing on the walls.)
You must GIVE him the scroll, then the token of peace.
SAY the magic words that King Holfane told you.
(If you forgot to write down the words, you can SAY INFO to hear them again.)
KISS him. (You can also GIVE him your ready weapon.)

You must give him a sword blank, the magic powder or the Amulet of Sorong, and the red diamond. Depending on which items you give him, the weapon he makes will be more or less powerful. Pay attention to the quality of the items, shown in their descriptions.
In case your couldn't find the magic words, here they are: SAY TREZORE to activate a combat help spell, or  SAY QORGAW to activate a shield spell.
Sword blanks can be found scattered around the temple. The Red Diamond of Haliak is buried in a pile of coal. (EXAMINE COAL)
